mapper.insert: insert into gonggu values( gonggu_seq.nextval, #{gongguName}, #{gongguWriter}, #{price}, #{type}, #{num}, #{category}, #{content}, #{photo1}, #{photo2}, #{photo3}, #{link}, sysdate, ${sendTime}, ${openTime}, ${endTime}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, default, default, null,sysdate, #{locationNo}, default )
mapper.select: select * from gonggu where status=1 and end_status=1 order by pullup_at desc
select * from gonggu where status=1 order by pullup_at desc
select count(*) from gonggu where status=1

SELECT * FROM GONGGU WHERE STATUS = 1 AND END_STATUS = 1 and 0.0359*0.0359>power(( to_number(longitude)-to_number(#{longitude })),2)+power(( to_number(latitude)-to_number(#{latitude })),2) order by pullup_at desc
SELECT GONG.GONGGU_NO ,GONG.GONGGU_NAME ,GONG.PRICE ,GONG.PHOTO1, GONG.LOCATION_NO FROM GONGGU GONG WHERE GONG.STATUS = 1 order by pullup_at desc
mapper.update: update gonggu set gonggu_name=#{gongguName}, price=#{price}, type=#{type}, num=#{num}, category=#{category}, photo1=#{photo1}, photo2=#{photo2}, photo3=#{photo3}, link=#{link}, send_time=${sendTime}, open_time=${openTime}, end_time=${endTime}, latitude=#{latitude}, longitude=#{longitude}, update_at=sysdate, location_no=#{locationNo} where gonggu_no=#{gongguNo}
